name: Tropical Pineapple Chicken Seasoning (3pk)
summary: We love a Sheet Pan meal, and this one is on heavy rotation with Epicure staff! It’s so quick to make, juicy, and packed with flavour, and it’s great for meal prep. It’s also customizable. Swap pineapple for mango or peaches, use the veggies from your crisper, and serve it with rice or quinoa or in wraps. Make it work for you!
